title: Error at deploying contracts

labels.name: P-unconfirmed
labels.description: Issue might be valid, but it’s not yet confirmed

body:
<!--
Need help?
Refer to our contributing guidelines for additional information about making a good issue:
https://github.com/ethereum-optimism/.github/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md
-->

**Describe the bug**
While running `npx hardhat delpoy --network xxx` on optimism/packages/contracts. I get the following error.

`TypeError: Cannot read properties of null (reading 'gasUsed') `
**To Reproduce**
Steps to reproduce the behavior:
1. Go to optimism/packages/contracts/deploy-config
2. Add new deploy file
3. Add the network to hardhat.config.ts  
```
xxx: {
      chainId: 31337,
      url: 'http://127.0.0.1:9545',
      accounts: [privateKey],
},
```
4. Run geth --datadir data init genesis.json
5. Run an ethereum network on geth --datadir data --http 0.0.0.0 --http.port 9545
6. export private key
7. run `npx hardhat deploy --network xxx`
8. Receive error

**Expected behavior**
Deploy the contracts to L1

**Screenshots**
deploy-config/xxx.ts. This is a copy of local.ts ( Possibly this is the problem, but I don't know why)
```
const config = {
  l1BlockTimeSeconds: 5,
  l2BlockGasLimit: 15_000_000,
  l2ChainId: 17,
  ctcL2GasDiscountDivisor: 32,
  ctcEnqueueGasCost: 60_000,
  sccFaultProofWindowSeconds: 0,
  sccSequencerPublishWindowSeconds: 12592000,
  ovmSequencerAddress: '0x70997970c51812dc3a010c7d01b50e0d17dc79c8',
  ovmProposerAddress: '0x3c44cdddb6a900fa2b585dd299e03d12fa4293bc',
  ovmBlockSignerAddress: '0x00000398232E2064F896018496b4b44b3D62751F',
  ovmFeeWalletAddress: '0x391716d440c151c42cdf1c95c1d83a5427bca52c',
  ovmAddressManagerOwner: '0xf39fd6e51aad88f6f4ce6ab8827279cfffb92266',
  ovmGasPriceOracleOwner: '0x9965507d1a55bcc2695c58ba16fb37d819b0a4dc',
}

export default config
```

```

    "alloc": {
        "872425436273C68F0720E8b06C845A17A17853b9": {
            "balance": "115792089237316195423570985008687907853269984665640564039457584007913129639935"
        }
    }
}

```

The error
```
✅ All Contracts have been checked for missing Natspec comments
deploying "Lib_AddressManager" (tx: 0x208d101e317d80097aa81cf687eb7066a6e99a1b2f142010f16f028955e9fb54)...An unexpected error occurred:

Error: ERROR processing /home/casper/optimism/packages/contracts/deploy/001-Lib_AddressManager.deploy.ts:
TypeError: Cannot read properties of null (reading 'gasUsed')
    at Object.tx.wait (/home/casper/optimism/node_modules/hardhat-deploy/src/DeploymentsManager.ts:559:55)
    at processTicksAndRejections (node:internal/process/task_queues:96:5)
    at async _deploy (/home/casper/optimism/node_modules/hardhat-deploy/src/helpers.ts:667:21)
    at async _deployOne (/home/casper/optimism/node_modules/hardhat-deploy/src/helpers.ts:1004:16)
    at async Object.deployFn [as func] (/home/casper/optimism/packages/contracts/deploy/001-Lib_AddressManager.deploy.ts:12:3)
    at async DeploymentsManager.executeDeployScripts (/home/casper/optimism/node_modules/hardhat-deploy/src/DeploymentsManager.ts:1219:22)
    at async DeploymentsManager.runDeploy (/home/casper/optimism/node_modules/hardhat-deploy/src/DeploymentsManager.ts:1052:5)
    at async SimpleTaskDefinition.action (/home/casper/optimism/node_modules/hardhat-deploy/src/index.ts:438:5)
    at async Environment._runTaskDefinition (/home/casper/optimism/node_modules/hardhat/src/internal/core/runtime-environment.ts:308:14)
    at async Environment.run (/home/casper/optimism/node_modules/hardhat/src/internal/core/runtime-environment.ts:156:14)
    at DeploymentsManager.executeDeployScripts (/home/casper/optimism/node_modules/hardhat-deploy/src/DeploymentsManager.ts:1222:19)
    at processTicksAndRejections (node:internal/process/task_queues:96:5)
    at async DeploymentsManager.runDeploy (/home/casper/optimism/node_modules/hardhat-deploy/src/DeploymentsManager.ts:1052:5)
    at async SimpleTaskDefinition.action (/home/casper/optimism/node_modules/hardhat-deploy/src/index.ts:438:5)
    at async Environment._runTaskDefinition (/home/casper/optimism/node_modules/hardhat/src/internal/core/runtime-environment.ts:308:14)
    at async Environment.run (/home/casper/optimism/node_modules/hardhat/src/internal/core/runtime-environment.ts:156:14)
    at async SimpleTaskDefinition.action (/home/casper/optimism/node_modules/hardhat-deploy/src/index.ts:584:32)
    at async Environment._runTaskDefinition (/home/casper/optimism/node_modules/hardhat/src/internal/core/runtime-environment.ts:308:14)
    at async Environment.run (/home/casper/optimism/node_modules/hardhat/src/internal/core/runtime-environment.ts:156:14)

```
**System Specs:**
 - OS:
 - Package Version (or commit hash):

**Additional context**
Add any other context about the problem here.
Could it be something wrong with the hardhat-deploy module?

Hello, The reason this failed is because in the deploy-config, `numDeployConfirmations` is not set, default=0. This means that after the deploy, hardhat checks for the transactionreceipt IMMEDIATLY, this is not possible on anything except for hardhat. Thus, it fails. For future people trying to deploy this to an not-hardhat network, *set* this to atleast 1.
I think it would be handy to include this in the docs somewhere.
